title: 'Not good'
body: This jacket is NOT water resistant. Doesn't work even in the lightest of rain or even very light rain. It's an okay quality although. But now it's useless for me since I got it for very light rain usage. Feeling cheated.

title: 'Good fit
column5: 'The jacket fits well and works for my primary purpose of use
column6: which is protection from dust while riding my bike. However

title: 'Looks same as in the picture'
body: Just average quality. Not a proper wind cheater, just a polyester jacket. Inner layer is same nylon material as outer layer, it makes the jacket too hot to wear during noon time. You will sweat too much if you wear if in the sun. It dries quickly, and retains no smell even if you sweat wearing it. It is good enough for short rides just as dust protection, that's all. Material is water proof, but the jacket is not. Neck is loose. Elastic at wrists and waists is not tight. It will get loose quickly. I have other jackets also, but they all cost more than this one. For the price, you get a decent jacket.
